thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 14 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hanwha Q Cells Sees Q2 2018 Revenue $490 Mln-$510 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hanwha Q Cells Sees Q2 2018 Revenue $490 Mln-$510 Mln
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Hanwha Q CELLS Co Ltd:
* Q1 REVENUE $443 MILLION VERSUS $432 MILLION * HANWHA Q CELLS CO - CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF APPROXIMATELY $145.0 MILLION FOR MANUFACTURING TECHNOLOGY UPGRADES AND CERTAIN RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT RELATED EXPENDITURES FOR FY18
* SEES TOTAL MODULE SHIPMENTS IN RANGE OF 5,600 TO 5,800 MW, REVISED FROM ITS INITIAL GUIDANCE OF 6,000 TO 6,200 MW FOR FY18 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
